testcase.name: increment the value for a single counter in the collection

failure.message: Given a counter "onecounter" with a value of "1" was added to the collection: Catchable Fatal Error: Argument 1 passed to OpenCounter\Domain\Model\Counter\Counter::__construct() must be an instance of OpenCounter\Domain\Model\Counter\CounterId, instance of OpenCounter\Domain\Model\Counter\CounterName given, called in features/bootstrap/DomainContext.php on line 58 and defined in /var/www/html/opencounter/src/OpenCounter/Domain/Model/Counter/Counter.php line 80
